attributes.action: The UK government must intervene to save of Eritrea.
attributes.background:
Isaias Afwerki, has ruled Eritrea since 1991. A constitution drafted in 1997 has yet to be implemented, no national elections held & no independent media.

Thousands flee the country to avoid indefinite national service, arbitrary arrest, enforced disappearances & degrading treatment in detention.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the situation in Eritrea, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
